admission_overview: BVCEC offers admissions into B.Tech and M.Tech programs through government quota, lateral entry, management quota, and international admissions.
Admissions are conducted as per APSCHE and Government of Andhra Pradesh guidelines.
btech_admission_process: Admissions into B.Tech are primarily through AP EAMCET counseling.
Candidates must qualify AP EAMCET and participate in APSCHE counseling.
Seat allotment is based on rank, reservation, and availability.
btech_eligibility: Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry are mandatory subjects.
Admission is based on AP EAMCET rank.
btech_entrance_exam: AP EAMCET is the entrance exam for B.Tech admissions.
The exam is conducted by APSCHE.
Only qualified candidates are eligible for counseling.
btech_counseling: Counseling is conducted online by APSCHE.
Candidates must register on the APSCHE portal.
Web options must be exercised to select preferred colleges.
lateral_entry_overview: Lateral entry admissions are for diploma and eligible B.Sc candidates.
Admission is directly into the second year of B.Tech.
lateral_entry_eligibility: Candidates must hold a diploma in engineering or a B.Sc degree with Mathematics.
Admission is based on AP ECET rank.
lateral_entry_entrance_exam: AP ECET is the entrance exam for lateral entry admissions.
The exam is conducted by APSCHE.
management_quota_overview: Management quota admissions are available for limited seats.
Admission is subject to college and APSCHE norms.
management_quota_eligibility: Candidates must meet minimum academic eligibility.
Entrance exam is not mandatory for management quota.
management_quota_process: Candidates must apply directly at the college.
Seat allotment is based on availability and eligibility.
important_admission_dates: Admission notifications are usually released in May.
Certificate verification is conducted in June.
Seat allotment takes place between July and August.
Academic year generally starts in August.
counseling_authority: Counseling is conducted by APSCHE (Andhra Pradesh State Council of Higher Education).
seat_allotment_rules: Seats are allotted based on rank, reservation, and availability.
Candidates must report to the college to confirm admission.
reservation_policy_overview: Reservation policy is followed as per Government of Andhra Pradesh norms.
reservation_sc: Reservation is applicable for Scheduled Caste candidates as per norms.
reservation_st: Reservation is applicable for Scheduled Tribe candidates as per norms.
reservation_bc: Reservation is applicable for Backward Class candidates as per norms.
reservation_ews: Economically Weaker Section reservation is applicable as per government rules.
reservation_pwd: PwD reservation is applicable for eligible candidates.
management_quota_reservation: Reservation policies are not applicable for management quota admissions.
admission_officer_details: Administrative Officer: Mr. A Y R V Prasad
international_students_overview: BVCEC admits international students, including students from Nepal and other countries.
nepal_students_availability: Yes, students from Nepal are currently studying at BVCEC.
nepal_registered_office_details: Nepal Registered Office In-charge: Mr. Rajesh Bashyal
international_admissions_incharge: International Admissions Coordinator: Dr. Meera Sharif Sheik
general_admission_rules: Seat allotment is strictly based on merit and reservation.
Change of branch is not permitted after admission.
Hostel facility is subject to availability.
degrees_offered: BVCEC offers undergraduate and postgraduate engineering programs.
The degrees offered are B.Tech and M.Tech.
